title: Not a 5-and-5-halves-opt
description: This kernel is based on my previous kernel and while it shares the same idea of permutating the chunks of the path it expands it to fives of points and handles permutations much faster by moving the code that finds the best permutation of chunks to numba which is a great tool to squeeze everything you can from python. As an initial path to start optimization from I'll use the output from my another kernel.
description_lemmatized: kernel based previous kernel share idea permutating chunk path expands five point handle permutation much faster moving code find best permutation chunk numba great tool squeeze everything python initial path start optimization ill use output another kernel
